languages.text: The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.
languages.original_text: Правители Адептус Механикус, почитающие технологии как культовый объект. Они направляют все производственные начинания и ведут последователей Бога-Машины в беспощадных завоевательских походах.

traits.locale_text: An adept of the Machine Cult, responsible for maintaining advanced technologies.
An adept of the Machine Cult, responsible for maintaining advanced technologies.
An adept of the Machine Cult, responsible for maintaining advanced technologies.

The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

languages.text: Правители Адептус Механикус, почитающие технологии как культовый объект. Они направляют все производственные начинания и ведут последователей Бога-Машины в беспощадных завоевательских походах.
Die Herrscher des Adeptus Mechanicus, die die Bemühungen der Fabrikation lenken und die Anhänger des Maschinengottes auf unbarmherzigen Kreuzzügen der rücksichtslosen Aneignung anführen.
languages.original_text: The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

traits.locale_text: Die herrschende Kaste des Adeptus Mechanicus, welche die Bemühungen der Fabrikation lenkt und die Anhänger des Maschinengottes auf unbarmherzigen Kreuzzügen der rücksichtslosen Aneignung anführt.

languages.text: Caste dirigeante de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, qui révère la technologie. Elle dirige la production industrielle et mène les serviteurs du Dieu-Machine dans d'impitoyables croisades d'acquisition.
languages.original_text: The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

traits.locale_text: Caste dominante de l'Adeptus Mechanicus qui dirige la production industrielle et mène les serviteurs du Dieu-Machine dans d'impitoyables croisades d'acquisition.

languages.text: 机械修会的统治阶级，他们崇尚科技，将科技视为奉献的对象。他们负责指导一切铸造与锻造事务，也会指引万机之神的追随者踏上无情的圣战之路，将欧姆尼赛亚的恩典收入囊中。
languages.original_text: The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的统治阶级，负责指导一切铸造与锻造事务，也会指引万机之神的追随者踏上无情的圣战之路，将欧姆尼赛亚的恩典收入囊中。

languages.text: 帝国技術局を牛耳り、技術を信仰対象として崇拝している。物作りを指揮して、機械神の信奉者たちを冷酷で厳しい改革運動へと導く。
languages.original_text: The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局の支配者カースト。捏造の試みを指揮し、機械神（マシンゴッド）の信奉者たちを冷酷で容赦のない聖戦へと導く。

languages.text: Los dirigentes del Adeptus Mechanicus, que adora a la tecnología con devoción religiosa. Dirigen las labores de fabricación y conduce a los seguidores del Dios Máquina en despiadadas cruzadas de captura.
languages.original_text: The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.

traits.locale_text: Casta dominante del Adeptus Mechanicus que dirige las labores de fabricación y conduce a los seguidores del Dios Máquina en acres cruzadas de captura.

languages.text: İmanları gereği teknolojiye büyük hürmet gösteren Adeptus Mechanicus yöneticileri. Sınai çabalara yön verir ve acımasız iktisapların amansız cihadında Makine Tanrı'nın müritlerine yol gösterirler.
languages.original_text: The rulers of the Adeptus Mechanicus, they revere technology as the object of their devotion. They direct the endeavors of fabrication and lead the followers of the Machine God in unforgiving crusades of ruthless acquisition.
